meanings.definition: A small, round, sweet baked good typically made with flour, sugar, and eggs.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious clumpets for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells various clumpets, including blueberry and chocolate chip.
meanings.sent3: The clumpets were so tasty, they disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her baking skills turned the simple clumpets into a heavenly treat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked clumpets filled the kitchen with warmth.

meanings.definition: To gather or form into a compact mass or group.
meanings.sent1: She clumpets the toys into a neat pile before bedtime.
meanings.sent2: The children clumpets together to listen to the story.
meanings.sent3: He clumpets the scattered papers on his desk with a swift motion.
meanings.sent4: The dancers clumpets into a mesmerizing formation on stage.
meanings.sent5: The artist clumpets the colors on the canvas to create a beautiful painting.

meanings.definition: A group or cluster of things, especially plants or trees.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with a lovely clumpets of flowers.
meanings.sent2: A clumpets of trees provided shade in the park.
meanings.sent3: The clumpets of balloons floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The clumpets of stars in the night sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The clumpets of clouds gathered before the storm.
